query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pacientes WHERE deleted_at IS NULL) as pacientes_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pacientes WHERE deleted_at IS NOT NULL) as pacientes_deletados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos WHERE deleted_at IS NULL) as atendimentos_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tenants) as tenants,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_log) as logs_auditoria
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pacientes WHERE deleted_at IS NULL) as pacientes_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pacientes WHERE deleted_at IS NOT NULL) as pacientes_deletados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM atendimentos WHERE deleted_at IS NULL) as atendimentos_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as usuarios,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tenants) as tenants,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM audit_log) as logs_auditoria
